name: Killian Moore
intro: Photographer and visual artist documenting silence, structure, and the edges of light.
bio: Killian Moore is a photographer working between still architecture and transient urban gestures.
His work blends editorial discipline with fine-art pacing, focusing on spaces where mood arrives before narrative.
Alongside print series, he releases selected works as NFTs to preserve provenance and support digital-native collecting.
statement: I photograph intervals. The meaningful frame is often the one between events, where place and memory overlap. My NFT editions are extensions of the same practice: independent artifacts with transparent ownership and long-term continuity.
